thread.title: BRIEF-Central China Securities Receives Decision Letter From Henan Regulatory Bureau Of CSRC

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Central China Securities Receives Decision Letter From Henan Regulatory Bureau Of CSRC

organizations.name: brief-central china securities receives decision letter from henan regulatory bureau of csrc
reuters) - central china securities co ltd

text:
Feb 12 (Reuters) - Central China Securities Co Ltd :
* RECEIVED DECISION LETTER ON ADMINISTRATIVE REGULATORY MEASURES OF HENAN REGULATORY BUREAU OF CSRC
* ACCEPTS SUPERVISION AND MANAGEMENT MEASURES IMPOSED BY HENAN REGULATORY BUREAU; TO COMPLETE RECTIFICATION BEFORE APR 22 Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
